name: Spider Hook: Rope Swing
description:
Hooks is a fun and addictive swing diversion. swing stickman Spider can give you pleasant illustrations

For that, you just have to:
-swing and sling to make incredible jumps
- make spider stickman fly
- Press your screen to hook and rope your spider stickman with your grapnel and release to let go
- Avoid every obstacle that stands in your way and sling rope.
- Swing from hook to hook to pass all the levels
